entities.name: harry

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is furious with Harry and Ron, trying to force them to talk to each other.

relationships.description: Rita's article confirmed Ron's belief about Harry enjoying attention.
Harry and Ron are in an argument, with Harry refusing to talk to Ron unless he admits to putting his name in the Goblet of Fire and apologizes for calling him a liar.
Hermione is concerned about Harry's feelings towards Ron, saying he misses him and knows Ron misses him too.
Although Harry denies missing Ron, it is implied that he actually does miss him.
